text: Results by electoral district. An election to Shetland Islands Council was held on 8 May 1986 as part of the regional elections. The election saw Labour gain another seat on Shetland council, and also saw the Shetland Movement contest the election on a party political platform for the first time. ==Aggregate results== ==References== Category:1986 Scottish local elections 1986
title: 1986 Shetland Islands Area Council election
